sections.description:
Adblocking extensions are most used to block the ads shown in browsers or websites. Nowadays, Adblock Plus is a popular extension to block ads in browsers. This will decrease the revenue of the blog owner. Now, We have introduced the WordPress plugin (CHP Ads Block Detector WordPress Plugin) that will detect most of the AdBlock extensions installed on the browser and show a popup to disable the extension. This plugin restricts the user to access the page unless the user will disable the extension for your website. This will work for most of the ads block extension such as Adblock, AdBlock Plus, ghostery, etc. This plugin will also works for opera built-in ads block extension. TESTED FOR:
  • ☞ Adblock
  • ☞ Adblock for Chrome™
  • ☞ AdBlock Plus
  • ☞ Ghostery
  • ☞ AdGuard
  • ☞ uBlocker
  • ☞ Fair AdBlocker
  • ☞ Hola ad remover
  • ☞ Comodo AdBlocker
  • ☞ Opera Built-in AdBlock extension
Features:
  • ☞ Doesn’t require any extension or library (Even jQuery)
  • ☞ Lightweight ☞ Ability to customize the title
  • ☞ Ability to customize messages
  • ☞ Hide or Show Refresh and Close Button
  • ☞ Change style of the popup
  • ☞ Customize own title or message
  • ☞ Custom Buttons
  • ☞ Button Text Customizable
  • ☞ Overlay Effect Customizable
  • ☞ Theme
  • ☞ Control Body Scroll
  • ☞ Disable plugin for Pages
  • ☞ Disable for Woocommerce Pages
  • ☞ Disable for individual posts or pages
  • ☞ Adjust to theme color
  • ☞ And much much more …

Change Log

v3.5

  • Added: Roll back to Previous feature
  • Update: Secure Update
  • Added: Control over "How to Disable Adblock" Modal

V3.4.0

  • Added: Random Class Generator System:- This will make difficult for adblock extension to detect our plugin. If someone blacklist popup modal element then the modal will be shown.
  • Added: Added New Icon For Adblock
  • Improved: Improved UI with modal round corner.
  • Depreciated: Left Alignment has been removed. Now, Modal will auto align to center.

V3.3.2

  • Fixed: Close Button Close Fixed
  • Added: Open animation Added
  • Fixed: Minor Issue Fixed

v3.3.1

  • Added: Now, You can hide the class ads reqest also.
  • Added: Added setting to check adblock after completely page load or immediately
  • Fixed: Class Add Request Continusouly added the html code on footer
  • Fixed: Hide Model Option issue fixed
  • Fixed: Minor issues fixed

v3.3

  • Added: Auto Updates from WordPress Dashboard. From Now, You don't have to update plugin via FTP.
  • Added: Now, You can blur the content if user has used AdBlock. Above the content, the message will be shown. This will works on only single article page. For more details, Check Documentation
  • Improved: Improve on Analytics such as Estimate Revenue and Revenue Recovered.
  • Fixed: Setting not saved while on text editor mode.
  • Improved: Improve AdBlock detection for Mobile UC browser
  • Added: Add or Remove plugin settings or anayltics data on Plugin Uninstall.

v3.0

  • Added: Highly Advance Adblock Analytics is integrated. You can disable this analytics system from Settings >> Analytics >> Disable Option
  • Fixed: Undefined Index error of metabox is solved. This error was occur while adding new page or post.
  • Added: Now, You can able to change the check interval. Check Interval means plugin will continue check the adblock install on this interval.
  • Added: Ability to export and import analytics data easily from WordPress dashboard.
  • Fixed: When you immediately close the popup then it will appear again. Now, This issue is fixed. [Issue Reported by Lom]
